director.name: Nunzio La Bianca Nunzio La Bianca

this_title: Aussie Park Boyz The Next Chapter
introduction: Cam tormented by guilt sets out to avenge his brothers death.Aussie Park Boyz  The Next Chapter picks up where the award winning , action packed Aussie Park Boys left off. Cam is down on his luck, Deep down he is tormented by the guilt he feels at his brothers death. He descends into a marlstrom of drugs and despair and even the the return from America from Pep, his life long best friend can’t snap him out of it.A dispute with drug baron, the sleazy Jimmy see’s Cam shot and left for dead in the desert.But he doesn’t die. Cam is redeemed by the aboriginal people who find him. He’s clean, he’s clear headed and he seeks revenge.Once again, Cam teams up with Pep and the boys.Watch out as the newly rejuvenated Cam sets about avenging his brothers killer.
foreign_title: Aussie Park Boyz The Next Chapter
